legacy.full_text: First China-Africa BDS Cooperation Forum was held in Beijing today. More than 600 representatives from China, nearly 50 African countries and relevant departments of the African Union Committee, universities, enterprises, and associations participated.

legacy.name: Economic Counsellor of Chinese Embassy in Malawi

legacy.full_text: The Forum is a newly established sub-forum within the framework of FOCAC. The theme of this forum is "Innovation·Cooperation·Openness·Sharing".

legacy.full_text: Chinese President Xi Jinping delivers a keynote speech via video at the opening ceremony of the fourth China International Import Expo held in east China's Shanghai on Nov. 4, 2021.

legacy.full_text: President Xi made fresh pledges to open the Chinese market wider as the country has fully delivered on its accession commitments to World Trade Organization (WTO).

legacy.full_text: China has applied to join the Digital Economy Partnership Agreement. Joining DEPA is in line with China's plan to deepen domestic reforms and pursue high-level opening-up, innovation and sustainable development with members in the new development paradigm.

legacy.name: Economic Counsellor of Chinese Embassy in Malawi

legacy.full_text: Chinese Vice Premier Liu He, held a video conversation with U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Tuesday.The two sides conducted practical, candid, and constructive exchanges on macroeconomic situation and bilateral and multilateral cooperation.

legacy.name: Economic Counsellor of Chinese Embassy in Malawi

legacy.full_text:
The two sides agreed that it is important for China and the U.S. to strengthen communication and coordination. 
They also agreed to maintain communication.

legacy.name: Economic Counsellor of Chinese Embassy in Malawi

legacy.full_text:
China issues white paper on responses to climate change
China released a white paper titled "Responding to Climate Change: China's Policies and Actions" to document the country's progress in mitigating climate change, and to share its experience and approaches with the world.
